name: Hyperbaric Oxygen Chamber (HBOT)
description: Pressurized chamber delivering 100% oxygen at 1.3-2.0 ATA. Increases dissolved oxygen in plasma, stimulates stem cell release, promotes angiogenesis, and has shown remarkable results in reversing biological aging markers in clinical trials.

dosage.notes: Clinical HBOT at 2.0 ATA requires prescription. Mild HBOT (1.3 ATA) available for home use. Tel Aviv protocol: 60 sessions for anti-aging.

keyFindings: Lengthened telomeres by 20-38% and cleared senescent cells by 11-37% (Hadanny 2020, Tel Aviv)
Improved cognitive function in elderly with MCI in randomized trial
FDA-approved for 14 conditions including wound healing and carbon monoxide poisoning
